aboutText1: Started from the hills of Rimini, carrying on the tradition... the piadina romagnola!!!
aboutText2: Then came the challenge in the center of Rimini, where, beyond piadina, we introduced a richer menu: hamburgers, big salads, and fried seafood — later adding a playground and a large parking area.
